name: Bridge Deluxe 2 with Omar Sharif Enhanced CD-ROM
name_original: Bridge Deluxe 2 with Omar Sharif Enhanced CD-ROM
description:
Bridge Deluxe 2 with Omar Sharif Enhanced CD-ROM is a card game developed by Oxford Softworks. It came out on 01-01-1995. Interplay Productions published the game.
You can play Bridge Deluxe 2 with Omar Sharif Enhanced CD-ROM on PC.
